policies.involuntary_refund:
Involuntarycancellations (e.g., over 3h delay or route suspension): Full refund permitted.
• Force majeure may allow for credit voucher with applicable fee.
• Maximum refund amount will not exceed original fare minus applicable fees.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Reissue permitted per fare rules:
• Flight changes within 12h of booking may waive change fee (fare difference applies).
• Airline-initiated schedule changes (≥30 min earlier or ≥2h delay): One free change allowed.
• Delay >5h at airport: Refund or amenities (e.g., meals, hotel) may be offered.
• Revalidation for schedule changes requires removing affected segments and rebooking same cabin.
• Subject line: “Schedule Change Revalidation” to agent@batikair.com.my (Inside Sales only).
• Voluntary changes: Subject to fare difference and applicable fees.
policies.voluntary_refund:
Refund requests are governed by fare type and conditions:
• Economy Super Saver: Non-refundable except for Taxes, Fees, and Charges (TFCs), excluding carrier-imposed charges.
• Economy Value, Economy Flexi, Business Promo, Business Flexi: Refunds permitted with cancellation fee; most restrictive fare rules apply.
• Refunds for deceased passengers: Full refund permitted with death certificate.
• Medical refund requests: Require official certificate; approval at airline’s discretion.
• Refunds for duplicate bookings must be submitted with proof of full payment within 24h of original booking.
• Once online or airport check-in is completed, cancellations or refunds are no longer permitted (except for airline-initiated cancellations).
• All refunds processed to the original payment method within 30–60 days.
• Refunds for group members or immediate family members are discretionary.
• Refunds for travel agent bookings must be submitted through the issuing agent.
•
policies.medical_refund:
• No public waiver code system.
• Manual review required for exceptions (e.g., death, medical, force majeure).
• Minor changes (gender correction, ≤3 character spelling fix) may be waived.
• PWD (Persons with Disabilities) may request fee waivers with valid card.
• Waiver of ancillary service fees is discretionary and varies by service.
• Force majeure situations may grant credit voucher on non-refundable tickets.
policies.name_change:
• Name changes (i.e., swapping passenger identity) are not permitted.
• Create a new PNR and refund old ticket per refund policy.
• Full surname/first/middle/alias additions or deletions require a new ticket.
• Fare difference and fees may apply if amendment accepted.
• Name must match government-issued ID or passport at check-in.
policies.group_booking:
• Minimum group size: 10 pax.
• Fare valid for 3 working days (re-quote valid for 1 day).
• Name list: Submit 10 days before departure.
• Ticketing: Complete 5 days before departure.
• Baggage: Economy 20–35kg, Business 30–40kg (varies by country).
• Meal: Included for international sectors >2h.
• Name changes:
  → Before ticketing: Permitted
  → After ticketing:
    - >48h: Two free name changes, then RM100 (domestic) / RM200 (international) per pax
    - <48h: Not permitted
• Date change:
  → Before ticketing: Not permitted
  → After ticketing: Reissue/revalidation with fee and fare difference
• Cancellation:
  → ≥30 days out: 20% allowed with deposit forfeited; beyond 20%, full payment forfeited
  → <30 days: No cancellations; 100% materialization required
• Deposit: 20% within 72h of quote; non-refundable
• Full Payment: Due 30 days before departure
• Payment Modes: Cash, EGHL, credit card, online banking (no checks <14 days)
• Clause: Batik Air may impose stricter deadlines and deposits for peak dates or aircraft-dominating groups.
policies.infant_policy:
• Age: 8 days to under 2 years.
• Fare: 10% of adult fare + tax.
• No baggage allowance unless otherwise specified.
• One stroller or car seat may be checked for free.
• Must carry government ID or birth certificate to validate age.
policies.baggage_policy:
• Cabin: 7kg + 1 personal item.
• Checked (OD Economy): 20kg
• Checked (OD Business): 30kg
• Varies by country (e.g. Bangladesh: 35–40kg; Nepal ex-KTM: 20kg)
• Flights operated by Batik Air Indonesia (ID) or codeshare: 20kg Economy / 30kg Business
• Excess baggage available post-booking up to 12h prior to departure.
• Fragile or high-value items not covered under standard liability.
policies.seat_request_policy:
• Seat selection subject to fare bundle and aircraft configuration.
• Emergency exit restrictions: Must meet age/fitness requirements.
• Seat fees may be refunded if reassigned for safety/operational reasons.
• Extra legroom available for fee (group: first come, first served).
• Group standard seating arranged after full ticketing.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
• Duplicate bookings may be eligible for void/refund if submitted with proof of payment within 24h.
• Airline discretion applies.
• No formal risk-free cancellation window stated.
• Voluntary voids follow refund policy for fare type.
• Once check-in is complete, void not permitted except for flight cancellation.

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
